article_title: In tight race, Democrats debate passion versus practicality
article_text:
By Lisa Lerer And Nancy Benac, The Associated Press

Posted Jan. 18, 2016 at 8:08 AM

Updated Jan 18, 2016 at 12:23 PM

article_metadata.description: CHARLESTON, S.C. (AP) " With just two weeks to go before the first votes of the 2016 race for president, Democrats Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders engaged in their most contentious debate match-up to date, underscoring their tightening primary race as the Iowa caucuses draw near.
article_metadata.author: Lisa Lerer And Nancy Benac, The Associated Press
